Set the nostress value in the codes.bsn file

Source: R/update_input_files.R
set_codes_bsn.Rd

Set the nostress value in the codes.bsn file

Usage

set_codes_bsn(run_path, nostress)

Arguments

run_path

Path to the folder where simulations are performed

nostress

nostress parameter in the 'codes.bsn' file to activate/deactivate plant stresses for plant growth.

  • nostress = 0: all plant stresses applied

  • nostress = 1: turn off all plant stresses

  • nostress = 2: turn off nutrient plant stress only
